sourcesContent:
Friends Profile

{{user.name}}'s Profile

info Personal Information

  • account_circle Name: {{user.name}}
  • person Username: {{user.username}}
  • email Email: {{user.email}}

group Friends

{{friend.name}}

@{{friend.username}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { User } from '../models/user.model'; import { ApiCallService } from '../api-call.service'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-friendprofile', templateUrl: './friendprofile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./friendprofile.component.css'], }) export class FriendprofileComponent implements OnInit { // Declare a variable to hold the user data user: any; username: any; constructor( private http: HttpClient, private apiService: ApiCallService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit() { this.route.params.subscribe((params) => { this.username = params['username']; this.callApi(this.username); }); } showFriend(friend: User) { if (friend.username === localStorage.getItem('username')) { this.router.navigate(['/viewprofile', { username: friend.username }], { relativeTo: this.route, skipLocationChange: true, replaceUrl: true, }); } else { this.router.navigate( ['/friendprofile', { username: friend.username }], { relativeTo: this.route, skipLocationChange: true, replaceUrl: true, } ); this.callApi(friend.username); } } callApi(username: string) { this.http .get(`http://127.0.0.1:8080/get_user?username=${username}`) .subscribe( (response) => { this.user = response; }, (error) => { console.error('Error: ' + error); } ); } addFriend() {} }
